options.text: Talk About Eavesdropping on the Faculty Lounge

nodes.text: Here's what I heard when I just happened to walk by the Faculty Lounge the other evening...
That's all they said? Oh well - just keep your ears open whenever you happen by the lounge. They may actually say something useful sometime.
I thought you might enjoy sharing some of this with me...
Well, aren't you the gentleman! I'm afraid I can't drink while at work, but I'll take it and put it away for later. Thank you, Sweetie.
I brought one perfect rose for you.
One perfect rose... <sigh> Why doesn't anyone bring me one perfect diamond ring?
Thanks, Honeybunch. You're so sweet.
I thought you might like a very rare wine...
Why, how very sweet of you! Such a special treat from such a special person. You're the best friend a girl can have.

options.text: Offer Sophia the Love Ballad Book

nodes.text: I brought you a book of love ballads... I thought you might find it romantic.
Love ballads - Is this supposed to be a hint of how you feel about me?
Oh, Sweetie, I've never met anyone quite like you! Love ballads... <chuckle> How romantic.

options.text: Offer Sophia the Dryad's Kiss Wine

nodes.text: I wanted to give you a kiss from the first time we met... So here it is - Some Dryad's Kiss wine.
Dryad's Kiss wine - that's one of the finest wines ever made! You mean to say that this treasure has been hidden in that musty old wine cellar all this time and no one found it?
Honey, you just get better and better. You deserve a kiss for this. <blows kiss>
I came across this necklace and I thought it would look very nice on you.
Ooh, it's very pretty. You are so thoughtful, Cutiebug. I'm so glad we met.

options.text: Offer Sophia the "One and Only" Ring

nodes.text: Sophia, there's no one in the world I would rather give this ring to than you. Would you please be my one and only?
You're giving me this? Oh, that's the sweetest thing anyone has ever done for me! You care that much about me?
I'm deeply in love with you, Sophia.
You're the nicest person I've ever met, Shawn. You're sweet and kind and generous. I wish more people were like you.
I'll think of you fondly whenever I wear this ring, Sugarpie.
I got these gems by destroying a raging stone golem, and I thought you might like them.
These are wonderful - and they look quite valuable. You are such a loving person, Shawn. There's no one sweeter.
Your hair is as colorful as your personality - it looks as luscious as a ripe plum.
Aren't you the sweetest thing? Your hair is just as bright as you are, Honey.
Your hair is.. um... unusual. Do you dye it?
Better work harder on your compliment skill, Tiger. You're obviously not a flatterer.
Your eyes sparkle like gold in the candlelight - they are gorgeous.
Oh, you say the nicest things, Sweetie.
What big eyes you have - I guess it must be the glasses you wear. They make you look like an owl.
<sigh> You're so cute, but you really need to work on your lines.
Your lips look like ripe sweet grapes glistening with the dew. I'd love to taste them.
Keep up the compliments, Red, and you may yet get a sample of how sweet I can be.
You have pretty lips. I can't wait to kiss them.
Don't hold your breath, dearie, you won't be tasting these lips any time soon.
I really enjoy talking to you. You're bright and clever as well as beautiful.
Flattery, dear, will get you anywhere.
You're really smart for a woman.
Oh really? I didn't realize that men and women were on a different scale of measurement. That explains why men say such stupid things, the poor dears.
You make a wonderful receptionist, Sophia. You have such a welcoming smile and sweet manner that it makes people happy just to come here to see you.
Sweetie, it is such a pleasure to see you. You know how to make me smile.
You make a great receptionist - hard working, devoted, and dedicated. I bet you'll make a great wife, too.
Sooooo... you think a wife should be hard-working and devoted? Maybe you are better off looking for a dog rather than a wife.
You look lovely, just as you always do.
Honey, you make my day.
I love the way you think, Sugarpie.
Now, how sweet you can be!
You are a ray of sunshine, Cutie.
Ginger, honey wouldn't melt in your mouth.
You look good... did you change your hairstyle or something?
If you're going to flatter someone, Sweetie, at least try to sound sincere.
My hair is the same as alway, Gingerbread. Thank you for noticing.
Yes... I dyed my hair blond. I wanted to see if blonds have more fun. I guess not.
No - I didn't change anything. Maybe you need your eyes examined... or your pickup lines improved.
Your lips look so luscious that it's hard to resist the temptation to taste their sweetness on mine.
Temptation is good for you, Red. It keeps you coming back for more.
How about you giving me a little kiss from your sweet lips?
I don't give anything away for free, Sugar - and I don't want need you're offering.
There's a bench in the gazebo of the courtyard surrounded by the scent of roses and jasmine where you can watch the glistening waters of the pool. Would you like to join me there tonight?
That sounds all sweet and sentimental, Sugarpie. I didn't know you were so romantic.
Would you like to go out on a date with me?
Well, Sweetiepie, seeing as how you can't leave the castle, it's kinda hard for you to take me out on a fancy date, isn't it?
I know a few special spots around the castle that are secluded and cozy where you and I could get together for some cuddles. Shall I warm you up?
I didn't peg you for the cuddling type, Sweetie. I see you more as the passionate kisses kind of guy.
Want to make out?
With such a romantic offer, how can anyone resist your lures? - Actually, it isn't difficult at all, Sugarplum.
The moon will be out tonight and the courtyard will be glowing in its light. Would you like to take a romantic stroll with me?
Sugar, I never realized what a gentleman you are! Such pretty manners you have for a kid fresh off the Caligari streets.
Want to go for a walk after you get off work tonight?
Somehow, the thought of strolling around the halls of this castle dodging Terk is not my idea of romance. Sorry, Sweetie, but I'll pass.
It seems so cold and lonely here in this isolated office. Why don't I put my arms round you and help you warm up?
Aren't you the thoughtful one to worry about my welfare? The thought of your arms holding me warms the cockles of my heart - and it's the thought that counts.
Would you like a hug right now?
Do I look like the hugging type? I'm more of the champagne and diamond rings sort of date.
You should come down to the Practice Room sometime to watch me work out. I'm really skilled with my hands and legs.
I just may have to check you out sometime, Gingerbread. You tempt me...
Check out my muscles - they are hard, firm, and ready to do the work.
Personally, Tiger, I prefer the muscles that are ready to do the fun stuff.
I'm so sneaky, I could steal the key to your heart away without you even noticing.
Don't be too sure about that, Cutie - I keep my heart locked up in my keep chest.
Well, if I can't find the key, I can always pick the lock.
I'm really skilled at a lot of things. Shall I show you my moves?
I think I'll pass, Coppertop, After all, I wouldn't want to get too distracted from my job.
I'm so clever that I can pretty much do what I like around here. There's no lock too complex to open or secret too hidden for me to find.
Maybe so, Sweetie, but for all your lockpicking, you haven't managed to get through the door to the castle grounds.
That's because I don't need to use this door. I have other ways to get out of this castle. I'd be happy to show you some of my secrets, say, tonight?
Hmmm... I wonder what sort of secrets you want to show me, Sugar? I guess they are sort of secrets that include a cozy, private rendezvous.
I can outfox and outwit anyone else at this school. You won't be able to resist my cunning lures to win your heart.
Really, Sweetie? The lures you've thrown my way so far don't even tempt me.
